name: Bard
message: Hey, what are you doing here? don't mess out or I would lose my job

name: Bard
message: You should leave, this is no place for minions, Im one of the lucky ones that can stay here

name: Bard
message: Better be quickly, the royalty doesn't like people like us

name: Bard
message: Still here? Im starting to think that you are one of the lucky ones too

name: Traveler
message: I'm not sure if I should be happy or sad about that

name: Bard
message: I'm not sure either, but I think you should leave before the guards come
